name: beebop music maker
description:
a half-functioning, buggy mess but at least you can interact with this one--- it's a prototype music-making program! some notes:

-- my webgl wouldn't export so im sorry y'all gonna have to download this one ;-;

-- press 'q' to quit

-- it's linear cuz i couldn't get the branching paths to work BUT

-- i've attached the music box below in case you wanna try to mix and match yourself to see what the game would have been like (i swear i tried so hard to make this work)

have fun?? or at least try to LOL i hope i can polish this up in the future but i'd appreciate any feedback!! (... or advice) (... or help)
